text: Elan is the third album by Firefall, released in 1978. It featured the single "Strange Way" which reached #11 on the Billboard Hot 100 and #24 on the Adult Contemporary chart. == Track listing == # "" – 4:41 (Rick Roberts) # "Sweet and Sour" – 3:29 (Jock Bartley, Rick Roberts) # "Wrong Side of Town" – 2:43 (Larry Burnett) # "Count Your Blessings" – 3:29 (Rick Roberts) # "Get You Back" – 4:10 (Larry Burnett) # "Anymore" – 3:56 (Mark Andes, Larry Burnett) # "Baby" – 3:45 (Larry Burnett) # "Goodbye, I Love You" – 4:19 (Rick Roberts) # "Sweet Ann" – 3:20 (Rick Roberts) # "Winds of Change" – 3:24 (Rick Roberts) ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !Chart !Position |- |1978 |Australia (Kent Music Report) |31 |} == Personnel == * Rick Roberts - lead vocals, rhythm acoustic guitar * Larry Burnett - lead vocals, rhythm electric and acoustic guitars * Jock Bartley - lead electric and acoustic guitars, backing vocals, electric slide guitar, * David Muse - keyboards, organ, Moog synthesizer, tenor saxophone, flute, harmonica * Mark Andes - bass, backing vocals * Michael Clarke - drumshttps://www.discogs.com/Firefall- Elan/release/1638457 ==References== Category:1978 albums Category:Firefall albums Category:Atlantic Records albums
title: Elan (Firefall album)
